languages.text: "Впрочем, человеческий разум не был способен понять Осколок... в одиночку. И я привлек на помощь нечеловеческий разум. Заключил сделку с друкари".
"But the human mind could never have comprehended the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the inhuman mind. I struck a deal with the Drukhari."
languages.original_text: "Впрочем, человеческий разум не был способен понять Осколок... в одиночку. И я привлек на помощь нечеловеческий разум. Заключил сделку с друкари".

traits.locale_text: "But the human mind could never comprehend the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the abhuman mind. Made a deal with Drukhari."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "But the human mind could never comprehend the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the abhuman mind. Made a deal with Drukhari."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "But the human mind could never comprehend the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the abhuman mind. I struck a deal with the Drukhari."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "But the human mind could never comprehend the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the abhuman mind. I struck a deal with the Drukhari."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "But the human mind could never have comprehended the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the inhuman mind. I struck a deal with the Drukhari."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "But the human mind could never have comprehended the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the inhuman mind. I struck a deal with the Drukhari."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Mais l'esprit humain est incapable de comprendre l'Écharde... du moins, à lui seul. J'ai donc fait appel à l'esprit non-humain, en concluant un marché avec les Drukharis. »
languages.original_text: "But the human mind could never have comprehended the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the inhuman mind. I struck a deal with the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: « Mais l'esprit humain à lui est incapable de comprendre l'Écharde... du moins, à lui seul. J'ai donc fait appel à l'esprit abhumain, en concluant un marché avec les Drukharis. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «Pero la mente humana nunca podría comprender el fragmento... por sí misma. De modo que recurrí a la mente inhumana. Llegué a un acuerdo con los Drukhari».
languages.original_text: "But the human mind could never have comprehended the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the inhuman mind. I struck a deal with the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: «Pero la mente humana nunca podría comprender el fragmento... por sí misma. De modo que recurrí a la mente pseudohumana. Llegué a un acuerdo con los Drukhari».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “然而，以人类的头脑，却永远无法理解碎片的本质……除非有人帮忙。于是，我在异形之中找到了帮手，我与黑暗灵族达成了协议。”
languages.original_text: "But the human mind could never have comprehended the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the inhuman mind. I struck a deal with the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: “然而，以人类的头脑，却永远无法理解碎片的本质……除非有人帮忙。于是，我在异型之中找到了帮手，我与黑暗灵族达成了协议。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Doch der menschliche Verstand kann das Fragment niemals begreifen ... allein. Und daher habe ich an den nicht-menschlichen Verstand appelliert. Ich bin einen Handel mit den Drukhari eingegangen."
languages.original_text: "But the human mind could never have comprehended the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the inhuman mind. I struck a deal with the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: "Doch der menschliche Verstand kann das Fragment niemals begreifen ... allein. Und daher habe ich an den abhumanen Verstand appelliert. Ich bin einen Handel mit den Drukhari eingegangen."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「だが、人間の精神ではシャードを理解することはできなかった…人間だけでは。だから私は、亜人の心に訴えた。デュカーリと取引をしたのだ」
languages.original_text: "But the human mind could never have comprehended the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the inhuman mind. I struck a deal with the Drukhari."

traits.locale_text: 「だが、人間の精神ではシャードを理解することはできなかった…人間だけでは。だから私は、亜人の心に訴えた。デュカーリと取引をしたのだ」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Fakat insan zihni, Parça'yı tek başına asla idrak edemez. Bu sebeple insan dışı zihinlere yöneldim. Drukharilerle bir anlaşma yaptım."
languages.original_text: "But the human mind could never have comprehended the Shard... alone. And thus I appealed to the inhuman mind. I struck a deal with the Drukhari."
